item.description:
Just a reminder of our next class….for those of you interested in learning simple steps on how to infuse more living foods into your food routine! Summer is the best time to get started!

SPROUT MAMA ACTIVATION – THURSDAY, JULY 26

10:30AM-2:30PM  (*note time change!)

Our time together has been amazing! Everyone is learning a lot and having great fun! A wonderful community is building that will shape our food cooperative that will launch this September. Co-op applications & membership requirements will be sent out in August. There are only 3 more classes remaining this summer (July 26, August 9 & 23). Our fall series will start the end of September.

This week we will be making:

Nut Milk

Chai Spice

MamaLicious Superfood Smoothie

Superfood Live Soup

Kombucha

Mexican Pate, Live Sour Cream, Mango Salsa & Guacamole

Kale Chips

Irish Moss Fruit Parfaits

Raw Chocolate

 

We will start with our MamaLicious Superfood Smoothie & discuss the various Superfoods we will be featuring and then move to our work stations. Lunch will be Mexican Burritos & Irish Moss Fruit Parfaits. Investment: $75, includes superfood smoothie, lunch, dessert & all recipes.

 

If you would like to order food to take home please let me know in advance. You can also place order for bulk items (such as nuts, superfoods, sprouts & produce but orders must be in one week in advance). If you cannot make it to class but would like to order items weekly – please email me! ox
item.name: Sprout Mama Activation! Hands-on Raw Food Class
